benchmark_details.name: InstructDoc
benchmark_details.overview: InstructDoc is the first large-scale collection of 30 publicly available visual document understanding (VDU) datasets, each with diverse instructions in a unified format, covering a wide range of 12 tasks.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive dataset for training and evaluating models on visual document understanding tasks using instructions.

data.source: 30 publicly available VDU datasets collected and annotated with diverse instructions.
data.annotation: Manual annotation of instructions by experts following a unified schema.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the evaluation protocol of each dataset.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance in zero-shot tasks.
methodology.baseline_results: InstructDr outperforms existing MLLMs and ChatGPT in zero-shot evaluations.
methodology.validation: The benchmark was validated through testing on held-out datasets.
